title: CPLN 5920 Portfolio
text:
This portfolio documents my learning journey in Public Policy Analytics (CPLN 5920).


Advanced spatial analysis and data science for urban planning and public policy.




Weekly Notes: My learning reflections and key concepts
Labs: Completed assignments and analyses
Final Project: Capstone modeling challenge




I am a city planner, urban designer, and architect passionate about creating resilient, equitable, and human-centered urban systems. I am currently pursuing a Master’s in City and Regional Planning at the University of Pennsylvania, with concentrations in Smart Cities and Transportation Planning. My academic interests focus on climate resilience, spatial analytics, and public policy; exploring how data-driven design can optimize resources and strengthen urban systems.
With professional experience in large-scale planning, blue-economy master planning, and redevelopment projects across India, I bring a multidisciplinary approach that blends creativity with analytical insight. I believe in cities that are both efficient and empathetic where design, technology, and collaboration come together to shape inclusive and sustainable futures.




Email: ichavan@upenn.edu
GitHub: @ChavanIndrajeet
